name: api_utility_Resources
description: The Resources class allows you to find and access objects including assets.

properties.name: EntityIdsToObjectList
properties.description: Translates an array of entity IDs to a list of Object references.

properties.name: EntityIdToObject
properties.description: Translates an EntityId to an object reference.

properties.name: FindObjectsOfTypeAll
properties.description: Returns a list of all objects of Type T.

properties.name: InstanceIDsToValidArray
properties.description: Translates an array of instance IDs to an array of bools indicating whether a given instance ID from instanceIDs corresponds to a valid Object in memory. The Object could have been deleted or not loaded into memory yet.

properties.name: Load
properties.description: Loads the asset of the requested type stored at path in a Resources folder.

properties.name: LoadAll
properties.description: Loads all assets in a folder or file at path in a Resources folder.

properties.name: LoadAsync
properties.description: Asynchronously loads an asset stored at path in a Resources folder.

properties.name: UnloadUnusedAssets
properties.description: Unloads assets that are not used.
